lead_paragraph: Pittsburgh Steelers quarterback Ben Roethlisberger left Saturday night's wild-card game against Cincinnati at the beginning of the fourth quarter with right shoulder injury.

headline.print_headline: Steelers Quarterback Ben Roethlisberger Leaves With Injury
headline.main: Steelers Quarterback Ben Roethlisberger Leaves With Injury
